articles.title: AAP MLA Amanatullah Khan walks out of jail day after arrest over demolition drive protest - India Today
articles.description: AAP MLA Amanatullah Khan was released from Tihar Jail in New Delhi on Friday night. He was arrested by the Delhi Police on Thursday night over a protest against the demolition drive in Delhi's Madanpur Khadar.
